channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: ‘Stunning security failures’ led to assassination attempt at Trump rally, House report finds
item.description: The shooting at former President Donald Trump’s Pennsylvania rally in July was “preventable and should not have happened.”

item.title: Helicopter crashes in Houston’s Second Ward after hitting radio tower, killing 4, officials say
item.description: Houston authorities are investigating a helicopter that might have crashed into a radio tower, killing four people on board, including a child.

item.title: How does abortion translate? Ballot measures are a challenge for interpreters
item.description: Reproductive rights measures are on the ballots in 10 states after heated debates over terminology and impact — and that’s just in English.
